user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable and supportive undergarments that I could wear daily without discomfort or the need to frequently adjust them.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and supportive bra that I could purchase online without the hassle of going to stores. The features such as the non-slip adjustable straps, foam-lined cups, and the overall construction appealed to me, as I wanted something that wouldn't dig into my skin or slip out of place. The positive experience I had with my previous online purchase of a sports bra also influenced my decision.

I needed a comfortable bra for everyday wear, and the affordability of the 3-pack was appealing. However, I found that while it was comfortable, it lacked the support I was looking for. The brand's reputation for quality also played a role in my decision.

I was in search of a wireless bra that offered both support and comfort. The detailed description of the construction, including the Magic Ring® and TruSupport® systems, convinced me that this product would meet my needs. The emphasis on comfort and fit was crucial, as I wanted something that would not bind or cause discomfort throughout the day.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, quality, and versatility. I value items that are well-made, soft, and provide a good fit without being restrictive. I appreciate the ability to customize or choose from different styles, as seen in my preference for interchangeable straps or reversible designs. Additionally, I tend to favor products that are reasonably priced and provide good value for money. On the other hand, I dislike items that lack support or have poor construction, as well as those that do not fit well or are difficult to use. I also find it unappealing when products do not meet my expectations in terms of quality or comfort.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's SmoothTec ComfortFlex Fit Wirefree Bra MHG199> / Item ID: B01HRFT6YQ / Price: $12.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Welcome to a wireless world where you never have to sacrifice comfort for support. Hanes® Smooth Comfort® wireless bra is brilliantly constructed for both. Carefully shaped foam cups and Hanes®' stay-in-place SmoothTec® band provide all the support you need, with the brand's ComfortFlex Fit® fabric that molds to your shape, not the other way around. One of the best features of this wirefree convertible bra is the Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry all day. This seamless, wireless bra provides full coverage with a flattering sweetheart neckline. You'll also appreciate the smooth cups and seamless construction that make this an ideal T-shirt bra. One more handy design detail is the convertible straps that offer two ways to wear for fashion flexibility."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Ultimate Underwire Bra, Low-Cut T-Shirt Bra, Convertible Underwire Bra, Convertible Underwire T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0C3LS6FZX / Price: $10.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Say hello to smooth comfort with Hanes®' low-cut, underwire T-shirt bra. The T-shirt-soft knit fabric virtually disappears under clingy clothes for the smooth, seamless look you want. Offering moderate coverage, its plunging front contours will be welcomed by all the different necklines in your wardrobe. The underwire construction is super comfortable and detailed with a stretch front band that helps keep the cups in place. Lightly lined foam cups have inside concealing petals for a no-show look. You'll love the moisture-wicking properties of the soft knit ComfortBlend® lining that helps keep you cool and dry. And to top it all off, the straps convert from straight traditional to racerback styling for even more fashion flexibility. There are lots of reasons that this is one of Hanes' favorite underwire T-shirt bras."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes ComfortFlex Fit Women's Oh So Light Wireless Bra with Comfort Foam, Full-Coverage T-Shirt Bra (S-3XL), MHG521> / Item ID: B08L6CWW3F / Price: $16.1 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Customers say that Hanes® Oh So Light wireless bra is so soft and lightweight that it's almost like wearing no bra at all, other than the flexible support. This sublime comfort starts with silky ComfortFlex Fit® fabric with 4-way stretch that molds effortlessly to your shape. It continues with the flexible, lightly lined foam cups that gently shape and support. Additionally, this ultra-light T-shirt bra is designed with a stay-in-place comfort band that further enhances support. You'll love how this wirefree, full-coverage bra disappears under clothes, and you'll appreciate the lightweight mesh back for airy comfort. And wait, there's more! Convertible straps offer fashion flexibility and tagless styling provides itch-free comfort."]

I prefer closure types that are comfortable and do not dig into my skin, such as hook-and-eye closures or front closures. Items with these closure types would be ideal for me.
